00023 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs_testcase extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00024 
00025         protected $components;
00026         protected $repository;
00027 
00028         protected function setUp() {
00029                 require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('mailformplusplus')."Classes/Utils/F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs.php");
00030         }
00031 
00032         protected function tearDown() {
00033         }
00034 
00035         public function test_getDocumentRoot() {
00036                 $this->assertEquals(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot(),t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('TYPO3_DOCUMENT_ROOT'));
00037         }
00038 
00039         public function test_getHostname() {
00040                 $this->assertEquals(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getHostname(),t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('TYPO3_SITE_URL'));
00041         }
00042 
00043         public function test_sanitizePath() {
00044                 $path = "fileadmin/test";
00045                 $this->assertEquals(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath($path),"/fileadmin/test/");
00046                 $path = "/fileadmin/test";
00047                 $this->assertEquals(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath($path),"/fileadmin/test/");
00048                 $path = "fileadmin/test/";
00049                 $this->assertEquals(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath($path),"/fileadmin/test/");
00050                 $path = "/fileadmin/test/example.html";
00051                 $this->assertEquals(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath($path),"/fileadmin/test/example.html");
00052         }
00053 
00054         public function test_getFilledLangMarkers() {
00055                 $fakeTemplate = '
00056                         <div>###LLL:firstname###</div>
00057                         <div>###LLL:lastname###</div>
00058                 ';
00059 
00060                 $langFile = 'EXT:mailformplusplus/tests/locallang.xml';
00061                 $langMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($fakeTemplate,$langFile);
00062 
00063                 $this->assertEquals(
00064                 $langMarkers,
00065                 array(
00066                                 "###LLL:firstname###" => "Firstname_translated",
00067                                 "###LLL:FIRSTNAME###" => "Firstname_translated",
00068                                 "###LLL:lastname###" => "Lastname_translated",
00069                                 "###LLL:LASTNAME###" => "Lastname_translated"
00070                                 ));
00071         }
00072 
00073         public function test_getFilledValueMarkers() {
00074                 $fakeGp = array();
00075                 $fakeGp['firstname'] = "Test";
00076                 $fakeGp['lastname'] = "Test";
00077 
00078                 $markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledValueMarkers($fakeGp);
00079 
00080                 $this->assertEquals($markers,array("###value_firstname###" => "Test","###value_lastname###" => "Test"));
00081         }
00082 
00083         public function test_removeUnfilledMarkers() {
00084                 $fakeTemplate = '###LLL:firstname######error_sthg#####abcdef���!"�$$%&/###';
00085                 $this->assertEquals(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($fakTemplate),"");
00086         }
00087 
00088         public function test_resolvePath() {
00089                 $path = 'EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/PHP/fake.php';
00090                 $resolvedPath = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($path);
00091                 $expectedPath = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().'/typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/PHP/fake.php';
00092                 $this->assertEquals($resolvedPath,$expectedPath);
00093         }
00094 
00095         public function test_resolveRelPath() {
00096                 $path = 'EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/PHP/fake.php';
00097                 $resolvedPath = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolveRelPath($path);
00098                 $expectedPath = '../typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/PHP/fake.php';
00099                 $this->assertEquals($resolvedPath,$expectedPath);
00100         }
